overview: After short-changing the Prostitute, the Renegades visit the King Of The Pimps for Blue Cake and Pink Cake.  Here they meet the Sailor who eats the Clown Cake and suggests they go to the Bar to watch the Dancer.  At the bar the Sailor gives the Renegades the Bag, with disastrous consequences.  Oh, them Renegades.
title: Renegades
